content: घटः [घट अच्] {@--1@} A large earthen water-jar, pitcher, jar, watering-pot; कूपे पश्य पयोनिधावपि घटो गृह्णाति तुल्यं जलं <ls>Bh. 2. 49.</ls> {@--2@} The sign Aquarius of the zodiac (also called कुंभ). {@--3@} An elephant's frontal sinus. {@--4@} Suspending the breath as a religious exercise. {@--5@} A measure equal to 20 droṇas. {@--6@} A part of a column. {@--7@} A border. {@--8@} A peculiar form of a temple.
